nodes.text: Dractu was a peaceful Mid Rim farming planet. It was the home of the Dractuvian people, as well as creatures mostly used as delicacies on the planet, such as Dractuvian cave slugs.
According to Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi, the planet had the worst food in the galaxy.

Dexter Jettster, a cook and friend of the Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi, went to the planet Dractu to find some Dractuvian cave slugs. After a series of events, and with some help from the natives, Dexter returned to his diner with four cave slugs. He prepared them for Kenobi, but was surprised when Obi-Wan said that this type of food was horrible.
